author: daxian-dbw
body:
Downloading zip file is broken in Azure DevOps Windows CIs, and we applied `DisableZipDownload: true` for Windows CIs to work around the issue (#9911).
The temporary fix should be removed once the official fix is in Azure DevOps.

comments.author: ThreeFive-O
comments.body: @daxian-dbw This issue was not auto-closed by the referenced already merged PR. Just wanted to let you know.

title: Remove the 'DisableZipDownload' setting when the official fix is in Azure DevOps
